alert.note: Alert for Adams; Highland; Hocking; Pike; Ross; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 9:43AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Central Ohio and South Central Ohio, including the following counties, in Central Ohio, Hocking. In South Central Ohio, Adams, Highland, Pike, Ross and Scioto. * WHEN...Until 1230 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 941 AM EST, radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Chillicothe, Portsmouth, Logan, Greenfield, Waverly, Wheelersburg, Nelsonville, West Union, New Boston, Piketon, Manchester, Peebles, Leesburg, South Shore, Kingston, South Webster, Bainbridge, Pike Lake, Kincaid Springs and Lucasville.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Highland; Hocking; Pike; Ross; Scioto
